item.description:
Let's Dance the Night Away....For First Thursday in Hartford, the Red Rock has live music by Latanya Farrell and her band.  It's great music for dancing.  I have a reservation under my name, so we will be able to have dinner or appetizers, drinks and get to know each other before the band starts at 8:00 pm.  So please arrive by 7:30pm, even if you are not eating, please.  There is plenty of parking diagonally across the street, and so far has been free, and well lit.  If we get an early response by all, I may be able to add just a few more, but right now the limit is 12. 

 Latanya Farrell & the Bookman Styles Band   

Normally, there is an event fee of $2.00 to help cover the meetup cost, but since there may be a $5.00 cover at the door, we will waive that for this event.

Let's Have Some FUN.  Any questions, please email your organizers.
item.how_to_find_us: Have a table reserved under Judi. I promise you will find us.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: First Thursday, Dine, Dance, Drink, Get Acquainted
